bills.title: Generally revise dangerous drug schedule
Interim study on the effects and regulation of kratom
Interim study of the Montana State Fund's Plan 3 workers' compensation insurance
Provide property tax assistance for law enforcement and firefighters injured in the line of duty
Revise crime of endangering welfare of child
Establish Montana mining day
Generally revise notification requirements related to the registration of sexual and violent offenders
Provide for apprenticeship programs for certain license types
Revise child support guideline laws and establish a committee
Clarify alcohol concession agreement permissible revenue structure laws
Provide account and transfer for BOI for investment in precious metals and digital assets
Generally revise civil liability laws
Revise insurance laws relating to wildfire and real property
Require legislative approval of greenhouse gas rules
Revise student online protection laws related to postsecondary opportunities
Exempt GHG emissions analysis for appliances, vehicles, engines
Revise laws relating to apprenticeship programs
Revise pharmacy laws
Generally revise employee tax credit laws to include apprentices
Revise watercraft laws related to nighttime boating and skiing
Allow for nonprofit development and management of attainable workforce housing on state lands
